gold.user: Admin user creating a new chain for garage management.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates a new chain with a unique identifier and returns the chain details.

gold.user: User retrieving details of a specific chain using its ID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified chain including name, location, and associated garages.

gold.user: User looking to view all garages associated with their account.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all garages with their basic information such as name and address.

gold.user: Manager updating the details of a specific garage.
gold.ideal: Successfully updates the garage information and returns the updated details.

gold.user: Admin adding a new customer to the system.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates a new customer profile and returns the customer's details.

gold.user: User retrieving information about a specific customer.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified customer including contact information and vehicle history.

gold.user: User adding a new car to their profile.
gold.ideal: Successfully adds a new car and returns the car details including VIN and model.

gold.user: User looking to retrieve details of their car using the VIN.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified car including maintenance records and owner information.

gold.user: User scheduling a periodic maintenance for their car.
gold.ideal: Successfully schedules maintenance and returns the maintenance details including date and service type.

gold.user: Manager approving a repair order for a customer's vehicle.
gold.ideal: Successfully approves the repair order and returns the updated status.
